programme.title: Fjords & Waterfalls of Norway
programme.desc: Experience the awe inspiring waterfalls and fjords of Norway in this 90 minute relaxing nature film. Soar down plummeting waterfalls and over the dramatic cliffs that plunge into the blue waters of remote fjords. Glimpse historic fishing villages accessible only by boat and relax to the calming soundtrack that accompanies the inspiring scenery.

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Alaska
programme.desc: Experience the magnificence of the Alaskan wilderness in "Journey Through Alaska". Fly over blue glaciers, see grizzly cubs cuddle with their mom, and witness alpenglow on Denali in this new release from NatureStream.tv. The full 90 minute film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv on August 22, 2023.

programme.title: Preview for Arches & Canyonlands
programme.desc: The sublime landscape of Arches and Canyonlands area of Utah is the star in this 90 minute film, which showcases awe-inspiring natural arches, dramatic canyon vista sunrises & sunsets, and flights through arches and over the Colorado River canyon. The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by beautiful Native American flute music. Note: All Drone footage was filmed outside of National and State Park boundaries. Runtime 90 minutes. Available now to subscribers via www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for Death Valley & Mono Lake Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the dramatic beauty of Death Valley, from sunrise over the sand dunes to the colorful formations of Zabriske point. Explore the unique limestone formations known as "tufa towers", the amazing bird life, and relaxing serenity of Mono Lake, an inland sea at the base of the Sierra Mountains. Bonus footage of the geothermal "hot creek" in the Sierras. This is a preview for the 1 hour film available at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for "Tahoe From Above" Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Soar over the worlds most scenic alpine lake in the 90 minute "Tahoe From Above". Breathtaking aerial cinematography of Lake Tahoe is accompanied by an inspiring instrumental soundtrack.This is a 2 minute preview of the 90 minute film, available on July 3, 2021 at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of Point Reyes & Oregon Coast
programme.desc: This is a preview of "Point Reyes and the Oregon Coast, available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Enjoy over 2 hours of beautiful vistas, and explore the dramatic beauty of Point Reyes National Seashore & the stunning sea stacks of the Oregon Coast. Experience the calming effect of the seashore paired with a beautiful soundtrack.

programme.title: Journey Through the English Countryside
programme.desc: Glide over the lush green landscapes, white sea cliffs, and castle ruins on this remarkable journey through Englands beautiful countryside, villages and castles. Spectacular cinematography and photography are accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack. Run Time 86 minutes. This full length film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Dave Chappelle Tells All

programme.title: Eva Mozes Kor: Surviving the Unthinkable

programme.title: Mia Kang: The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Christine Ha: Courage in the Kitchen
programme.desc: In this exclusive Goalcast Original, the first blind contestant and winner of MasterChef, Christine Ha, opens up about how she lost her sight and her mother at a young age. These formative experiences shaped who she is today and pushed her to never give up on her dreams and finding ways to connect with the spirit of her mother.

programme.title: Katie Beers: The Girl In The Wall
programme.desc: Spaceplex is 9 year old Katie Beers’ favorite spot, before she’s abducted at that same location in December 1992, just before her birthday. For 17 days, the investigators dig into the family’s lies, each more suspicious than the next, hoping to find the lost girl. Katie is trapped in the wall, but she still has her wits, which will eventually lead to justice against her kidnappers.

programme.title: Michael Jordan: The Rise of an NBA Legend
programme.desc: Michael Jordan has lost almost 300 basketball games, but his most shocking loss is NOT what you think! His biggest loss came right after his worst nightmare came true, off the court. The secret truth behind the “Greatest Basketball Player Of All Time” finally came out when MJ’s suspicious loss led him down a “delusional” path. Why did Michael Jordan retire from basketball?

programme.title: Mandy Harvey: Feeling the Music
programme.desc: When Mandy Harvey completely lost her hearing, her dreams of a career in music came crashing down! Although she could not even hear her own voice, her family encouraged her to pursue her passion and NEVER QUIT. Thats when she went on Americas Got Talent and SHOCKED the entire nation, including Simon Cowell himself!

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Karma is Served
programme.desc: Blind chef, Christine Ha, shocked the nation when she tried out for the reality show cooking competition, Masterchef. Perhaps even more surprising was Gordon Ramsay’s scandalous reaction. She made him eat his words on national tv and made Masterchef history!

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Tell my Story
programme.desc: Jason Reid faced every parent’s worst nightmare when his son Ryan died by suicide at the age of 14. The tragedy lit a fire in him to end teen suicide by 2030. Fathers NEED To Change NOW. In this Goalcast Original, Jason Reid and a group of fathers have an intense conversation about teen suicide. Jason shares his heartfelt story as well as crucial parenting advice that can have life-saving consequences. Witness the power of vulnerability and discover simple ways you can transform your relationship with your kids by giving them the tools to thrive in life.

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: Embrace the Suck

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: Win Against all Odds

programme.title: Sarah Prout: Toxic Love

She was brave enough to leave her abusive, toxic relationship, and that courageous decision changed her life for the better. We hope her courage inspires you, and remember you are stronger than you think!

programme.title: How to Break Through Retirement Barriers
programme.desc: "What obstacles stand in the way of your retirement? If youre like most of us, too many to count! Not having a formal plan, overspending, and not having retirement savings are the top 3 for most people. On this episode of Your Money, Your Wealth, Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA show you how to break through those retirement barriers."

programme.title: When to HOLD OFF on Doing Roth Conversions
programme.desc: "John in Boston is in the 32 tax bracket. Should he do Roth conversions? Flight Deck Dad and Irish Girl in Pensacola have a lot of tax-free pension income. Should they do Roth conversions? Bert and Ernie in New Jersey wonder if they should convert to Roth or take advantage of zero percent capital gains tax rates. Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA spitball for all of them, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 529. Plus, Michael and his wife in Bellevue are 34, in the 24 tax bracket and wonder if they should contribute to tax-free or tax-deferred accounts, and if they should slow down on retirement savings and start a bridging account for the years between when they want to punch the clock in their early to mid-50s, and when they can access their retirement savings. Then for something completely different, Frenchie from Maine writes back in: what are the disadvantages to paying off her mortgage ASAP, and whats the tax-efficiency of a money market compared to bond funds?"

programme.title: End of the 40 year career & What Do CEOs Actually Do
programme.desc: Go to school, get good grades, get into college, become a professional and work your way up the corporate ladder until you can retire with your savings or a pension. That’s the plan for a lot of people and despite what a lot of hustle bros on the internet might tell you, it’s a good plan if you can stick to it. 9-5 jobs are picked on a lot usually by people that need a way to sell a get rich quick scheme. The standard 40-year professional career has let millions of people enjoy very comfortable lives free from the stress that comes with being in business for themselves, but that is all coming to an end. In just the last 24 months we have experienced quiet quitting, quiet hiring, work shortages AND labor shortages, what a lot of people aren’t talking about though is how this is just the result of companies still trying to make outdated business models work in an age where workers can demand more from their employers. The establishment of the 40-year career is crumbling and there are some employers and employees that are doing a great job taking advantage of it, and there are others that are suffering. The first trend is that despite the pervasive stories about hustle culture and people making partner before the age of 30 while also building out a side business that drop ships physical NFT’s through the myspace storefront, the average worker is not grinding, they are getting less ambitious. A wall street journal article surveyed a range of businesses in demanding fields that are usually staffed by ambitious workers like law, business consulting, and marketing. The companies all reported challenges with getting their employees to go above and beyond which is really corporate speak for working late and coming in on weekends. A law firm told the Wall Street Journal reporters that typically they would have no problem getting junior associates to do extra hours to make sure time sensitive work was completed for their demanding clients. But now new associates have started saying no to working weekends and late nights whi

programme.desc: 'David' tells the story of Daud, an eleven year old religious Muslim boy growing up in Brooklyn. Concealing his Muslim identity, Daud inadvertently befriends a group of Jewish boys who through a haphazard sequence of events mistake him for being Jewish and accept him as one of their own. A genuine bond of friendship is formed between Daud and Yoav, on of the Jewish boys; Daud experiences a sense of freedom, joy, and camaraderie that he has never felt before, and for a brief time enjoys being a carefree eleven year old Brooklyn boy. When the Jewish boys discover Daud's true identity, Daud's world is shattered and he is left alone, struggling to come to terms with his place in the world.

Creekbound and Down
programme.desc: Join up-and-coming professional whitewater kayakers Knox Hammack and Trent McCrerey as they travel around the American West in search of epic whitewater and glory, hitting all the rapids they can find along the way.

programme.title: Turkey HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they travel to Turkey, home to a surprisingly robust ski culture and some unique spots to film snow sports.

programme.title: Corsica
programme.desc: Tag along as the crew hunts lines in the high alpine of the Corsican Alps. Corsica is an island in the Mediterranean known more for its beaches than for its skiing, but that won't stop TGR from finding what they're looking for.

programme.title: A World of Injustice HD
programme.desc: The link between racial inequality and the outdoors. Even though Jeremy and Selema share a passion for snowboarding, their experience with the sport has not been synonymous.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: Billy the Bear
programme.desc: Anyone who's seen TGR's 2015 bike film unReal remembers the scene in which Tom Van Steenbergen is chased up a singletrack by a massive brown bear. Take a look behind the scenes at how the segment was brought to life.

programme.title: Light the Wick
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Light the Wick, TGR's 2010 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking Lake Mazinaw
programme.desc: Bon Echo is a small and extremely beautiful Provincial Park in Ontario's Highlands, which draws in visitors from all over thanks to the world class canoe tripping and kayak touring that it offers. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he takes in the dramatic cliff faces on Lake Mazinaw, which bear hundreds of Indigenous pictographs, from the seat of his sea kayak.

programme.title: Whitewater Kayaking On The Ottawa River
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: Sams Garage

programme.title: The Lifted Life

programme.title: Formula 2 Interseries

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Superbike
programme.desc: The premier class of MotoAmerica returns to the iconic Road Atlanta circuit for Superbike Race 1. Five-time champion Cameron Beaubier, aboard his BMW M 1000 RR, enters with a narrow points lead after a strong performance at Barber Motorsports Park. Close on his heels is three-time champion Jake Gagne, riding for Attack Performance Progressive Yamaha Racing, eager to reclaim the top spot.

programme.title: Craft Hacks
programme.desc: Time-saving quick tips to feed your crafting craving.

programme.desc: Sewing experts offer easy ways to create neat sewing projects right at home. Viewers of all skill levels learn tips and techniques for creating professional-looking garments, personalized apparel and home accents. Weekly episodes feature various themes, and feature two main projects and one shorter technique segment. Some projects include monogramming napkins and towels; baby poncho, hooded towel and baby-friendly diapers; embellishing yoga pants with a clothing tattoo; and sewing on knits.

programme.title: Slow TV - Cookie Decorating 1
programme.desc: Slow it down with cookie decorating.

programme.title: Pup Cake Party

She'll break down the decorating process and share her tips on shaping your cake, sculpting your fondant, and adding texture. Plus, learn her quick tips for baking up some tasty, bone-shaped treats and kibble to go along with your cake.

programme.title: Exercise for Seniors

programme.title: Noodles with Peanut Sauce

programme.title: Past Tense
programme.desc: A physician invents a time machine to go back in time and make a fortune by selling penicillin to a pharmaceutical firm. His wife is more concerned about paying bills because he's neglecting his practice, so she threatens to destroy the device. If she does, could he be trapped in the past?

programme.title: MADNESS
programme.desc: Alex is a disturbed young man bent on destruction, but when his plans get interrupted by his step-sister and her four, hot college roommates, madness ensues. Confined to their parents house as a blizzard moves in, the six settle in for a long, boring night. However, when the power goes out and one of the girls accidentally dies, Alexs odd behavior becomes more and suspect. He tries desperately to cover his tracks, but all the while he hides an even darker deed and in the end, only one will survive.

programme.title: CAUGHT IN THE GAME
programme.desc: Lisa James a beautiful real estate broker get Caught up in a vicious love Triangle. As the crooked scheme she runs with her drug dealing boyfriend Todd Scott get out of hand when she falls in love with the romantic new janitor Joshua. Her new loves bring envy between her and her friends Angie and Eve, and also with Todds right hand man Craze. With Lisa blinded by love she losses control with her scheme and she cant see who coming to stab her in the back as she gets Caught in the Game

programme.title: EARLY GRAVE
programme.desc: After ten years apart, six people are summoned to the isolated island estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven fractured adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives.Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. The group is stranded at the estate, and unable to get off the island. Then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one.Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited ten years to wreak a bloody vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE.

programme.title: Videos Divertidos
programme.desc: ¡Prepárate para los 10 videos más divertidos de AFV!

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: BASHA vs BILLA
programme.desc: Basha is in great spirits as he once again runs circles around Sundar and gets his daily exercise leading the other in a one-sided chase when suddenly his naughtiness takes a nosedive as he finds himself face to face with his biggest rival Billa a monkey who is naughtier, meaner and more menacing. The moment Sundar finds out that Billa also has a fascination for banana fritters, he bribes the new monkey to his side. Now for the first time, Basha has to face a foe who is his match, or perhaps a tough match. Lets see how this all ends!

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A poor but loving couple secretly sells their most precious things to spend a happy Christmas and buys gifts for each of them.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: MILKY MESS
programme.desc: Business is brisk and Chai Raja frets as the milkman has not arrived and he is almost all out of milk. Sundar gets a so called brain-wave and lures in a genial cow from the not distant yard to help restore supply. Chai Raja is favourably impressed but then equally depressed when following the cow, enters a pugnacious bull not all happy with Sundar for wooing away his girlfriend. Its manic mayhem as the bull chases Sundar around the tea-shop, lent a generous helping hand by Basha who seems to know every trick in the book to drive the bull berserk and Sundar barking mad.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: MOUSE TRAP
programme.desc: Business is a bit slow at the tea shop and Chai Raja tries churning up new inventive snacks to entice in the customers. The overworked Sundar can only salivate at the sight of the overflowing platters of food and zealously guards them from Basha. It takes all of Sundars self-control not to sample even a fallen fritter/vada. Chai Raja meanwhile opens his larder to take some more flour when much to his shock, he sees a small tail flick out of sight. Mice!! Chai Raja immediately sets Sundar the task of getting rid of them. Sundar after some paw-snapped agony manages to rig a mousetrap and sets it to catch the scurrying culprit. He waits all night and finally dozes off when he is awakened by the snap of the trap. Sundar victoriously marches only to find in the trap, a baby mouse in a diaper. The little tyke of a rodent wails so piteously that Sundar, after some stern admonishing, ushers out of the shop and signals that he should not return. Next morning , business is brisk and Sundar rushes about to wait on customers when he hears a shriek. The lady customer points and much to his shock Sundar sees the diaper-mouse scurry with fritters. Sundar gets an earful from Chai Raja for not completing his task. The wily Basha meanwhile ferrets out the baby mouse and surprises it as it steals the next time- but Basha too is charmed by the baby mouse and ends up showing it his secret stash of fritters. The baby mouse acts as in complete awe of Basha and wants to be his crony.Basha is thrilled and starts tutoring the baby mouse in the art of stealing fritters. The baby mouse goes one step further and uses his big baby eyes each time Sundar catches him- one long wide-eyed pleading look and Sundars heart melts. Both Sundar and Basha think that they will be the mentor to the baby mouse who however is quite a prankster.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Royal rift
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a banjo and they find themselves in a fantasy castle where a King and a Queen keep fighting about everything. The Twins will play a song that will bring peace in this land.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Dress code
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world where they can’t get into a party because they’re not wearing the right clothes.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: 1,2,3… Smile~
programme.desc: Duda discovers Dadas digital camera. Suddenly, he becomes hooked on taking photos. Scot shows up thinking they are going on a picnic. But, he finds out that they are going swimming in the lake instead. Ashamed of not knowing how to swim, Scot tries to practice in a kiddie pool when no one is around. Unfortunately, Duda captures Scots embarrassing moment on camera. Afraid that Duda will show the photo to others, Scot is determined to delete it at all costs. After losing his boat to Duda in a bet, Scot becomes frantic when he sees his friends taking a ride on it with Duda and his camera. Without thinking, Scot jumps into the lake to go after them. Will Scot be okay?

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: Eggface Revenge
programme.desc: Brains brilliance at mathematics helps her to win a prize, but also the jealousy of Egghead, a brainy space villain.

programme.title: Driving Pinkar
programme.desc: Scot is determined to drive to Pinkar today. So, wait for your chance to do just that. Unfortunately, Duda shows up and ruins their plans. Duda sits in the drivers seat and pretends to drive Pinkar, but Pinkar starts moving. While Duda enjoys the unexpected trip, Scot hides in the back of the car. When Scot reveals himself, he discovers that Duda doesnt know how to drive, and the pleasant trip quickly turns into a hair-raising one. Caber sees Duda behind the wheel and runs to tell Dada. Dada and the gang rush to stop Pinkar before Duda ends up in the lake. Everyone does what they can to help, but in the end, it is Scot who manages to stop Pinkar at the last moment.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Fruits Of The Forest – Little Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Detective Sandra and her assistant Fo go to the tale of Little Red Riding Hood, having been called out by the Grandmother, whose knitting needles have mysteriously gone missing. Shortly after they arrive, and without Sandra realising it, the Wolf captures Fo and takes him to his lair in order to devour him. While Fo desperately uses his ingenuity - and a cookery book – to avoid becoming the wolf’s dinner, Sandra gets down to work in search of the knitting needles. The investigation will lead the detective to the Wolf’s lair, and thus she saves Fo. Sandra will also discover that Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf have reached an agreement to hide the knitting needles, because Little Red Riding Hood is sick of wearing the red hoods her grandmother knits for her.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Dusty Rides Again
programme.desc: When Fred’s mom’s vacuum breaks, Brains repairs and “improves” it, adding artificial intelligence, which turns him into a talking best friend for Friday. Dusty brings other appliances to life, and they try to lure Friday away from his human friends

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: BRUSH WITH DANGER
programme.desc: The Guardians can’t believe the Elders are giving them art lessons – HARD art lessons, with lots of criticism! But all the lessons in brushwork pay off when the Guardians apply their new skills to wielding their weapons as they battle a big color-blasting mutant snail sent by….you guessed it!

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Inspiración de vacaciones de verano
programme.desc: Ana se gana unas vacaciones en un hotel de lujo. Ella no se imaginaba que este suceso cambiaría toda su vida.

programme.title: Una foto para siempre
programme.desc: La fotógrafa Jessie olvida sus estereotipos cuando conoce al famoso actor Nate Brown en la boda de su hermana

programme.title: El vestido de novia
programme.desc: Zhenya regresa del trabajo y encuentra a su novio en la cama con su amiga.

programme.title: El vestido de novia
programme.desc: Zhenya regresa del trabajo y encuentra a su novio en la cama con su amiga.

programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Suddenly It's Spring 1944
programme.desc: In this longer cartoon, Raggedy Ann's little girl mistress is seriously ill and needs sunlight to recover. Raggedy Ann sets off on a mission to the sun and other elements to make Winter end early. works a minor miracle, with the help of the elements.

programme.title: Little Lambkin- 1940
programme.desc: A precocious toddler, wanting to return to his watermelon patch and a pair of animal friends in the country, tampers with the electronic gadgets in his new city home and creates chaos.

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Space Thunder Kids 1991
programme.desc: Three children pilots fight against the Dark Empire on their mission to destroy the universe.

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: Back Stage-1919
programme.desc: Working their fingers to the bone to prepare the set for an upcoming performance, the enthusiastic stagehands, Roscoe and Buster, find themselves on stage when the cast quits. However, is will alone enough to earn a big round of applause?

programme.title: Convict 13 -1920
programme.desc: A young golfer is mugged by an escaped convict and finds himself in a prison where he foils a jailbreak.

programme.title: The Fatal Glass of Beer 1933
programme.desc: The prodigal son of a Yukon prospector comes home on a night that "ain't fit for man nor beast.

programme.title: Boys of the City 1940
programme.desc: Street kids get sent to the country, where they get mixed up in murder and a haunted house.

programme.title: A Fair Exchange- 1914

programme.title: The Dentist 1932

programme.title: His Favorite Pastime - 1914

programme.title: Mud and Sand 1922
programme.desc: Rhubarb Vaselino lives in a small village, when he and his friend, Sapo, enter a bullfighting contest, Sapo dies, but Rhubarb kills three bulls and becomes a local hero earning money. programme.title: Blazing Frontier 1943
programme.desc: In the 19th and last of the PRC "Billy the Kid" series (first six with Bob Steele and last 13 with Buster Crabbe), a feud develops between the settlers and the railroad detectives in Red Rock Valley. Clem Barstow sends for Billy the Kid and Fuzzy Jones to help. Buster suspects that Ward Tragg, chief of the railroad detectives, and Luther Sharp, land agent for the Western Railroad Company, are defrauding the settlers without the knowledge or sanction of the company. Billy and the settlers rustle off cattle, which have been illegally confiscated by Tragg and his men, in order to raise money for Barstow to bid on a ranch which Sharp is illegally auctioning off. Billy discovers that the purchase price on the deed has been altered and Barstow writes the company to send a man to investigate. When Tragg learns about this, he makes plans to kidnap the railroad official.

programme.title: This program is brought to you by

programme.title: The God Of After
programme.desc: It’s time to get ready. In “The God Of After,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that the attack you’re facing is proof of the purpose on your life.

programme.title: Don't Tap Out Tap In
programme.desc: What are you really fighting? In “Don’t Tap Out Tap In,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that God is waging war with what’s coming against you — because the fruit is coming!

programme.title: Think Like A Reaper
programme.desc: In “Think Like A Reaper,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to think about the outcome while living in the fear, frustration, and fatigue of right now. You’ll be encouraged that God is with you in your hard place, and help is closer than you realize.

programme.title: This Is What A Miracle Feels Like
programme.desc: Sometimes, a miracle feels like you’re free, but you’re still running. Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us to look for signs that God is at work when our feelings haven’t caught up to our reality in “This Is What A Miracle Feels Like.”

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.
